H0.text: Which ITV magazine style show ran from 1968 to 1980 and featured presenters including Jenny Hanley, Mick Robertson and Tommy Boyd. Nationwide

H1.text: Which ITV magazine style show ran from 1968 to 1980 and featured presenters including Jenny Hanley, Mick Robertson and Tommy Boyd. This Week

H2.text: Which ITV magazine style show ran from 1968 to 1980 and featured presenters including Jenny Hanley, Mick Robertson and Tommy Boyd. The Big Time

H3.text: Which ITV magazine style show ran from 1968 to 1980 and featured presenters including Jenny Hanley, Mick Robertson and Tommy Boyd. Magpie

A4.text: Nationwide was a BBC current affairs television programme that ran from 9 September 1969 until 5 August 1983.

A5.text: Originally broadcast on BBC1 from Tuesday to Thursday, and then each weekday from 1972, it followed the early evening news, and included the regional opt-out news programmes.

A6.text: Jenny Hanley was a presenter on the ITV children's magazine programme Magpie.

A7.text: Hanley appeared on Magpie from 1974 to 1980.
